alert.note: Alert for Big Hole Mountains; Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 23 at 3:00AM MST until December 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches below 6000 feet with 15 to 20 inches possible across the mountains passes above 6000 feet. Periods of gusty winds Thursday as high as 40 mph creating blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Centennial and Big Hole Mountains from Targhee Pass south to Pine Creek Pass. * WHEN...From 6 AM Thursday to 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible at times. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Big Hole Mountains; Centennial Mountains, Island Park
